meanings.definition: Done with deliberate intent or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She made a prepensely decision to study for the test in advance.
meanings.sent2: The prepensely plan to surprise her friend worked perfectly.
meanings.sent3: He prepensely wore mismatched socks to make his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her prepensely chosen outfit made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The prepensely decorated room felt cozy and inviting.

meanings.sent1: The prepensely idea to throw a surprise party was a success.
meanings.sent2: He had a prepensely negative opinion about the movie before watching it.
meanings.sent3: The prepensely prank on his sister made her jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her prepensely planned speech left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The prepensely created artwork left everyone speechless.
